title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 201.4 - Vehicular bridges
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 201.4 - Vehicular bridges

State Regulations

The vehicular bridges subject to toll shall be the Mid-Hudson

Bridge, the Rip Van Winkle Bridge, the Bear Mountain Bridge, the

Kingston-Rhinecliff Bridge, and both spans of the Hamilton Fish Newburgh-Beacon

Bridge. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
201.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
